translations: 以符号表示；以标记法谱写（音乐）（notate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Most of the time, you are a foreign businessman, you don't want to offend your Chinese host by notating the most expensive dish ordered.
sentences.translation: 多数时候，这种事情发生在外国商人身上：他们不想因为拒绝享用最贵的食物而得罪了中国的东道主。

sentences.sentence: It was less than 100, 000 years ago that our human predecessors first made meaningful marks on surfaces, notating the phases of the moon or drawing animals on cave walls.
sentences.translation: 从古至今，这种改变在读写形式的进化中早已屡见不鲜。 在不到十万年前，人类先民才第一次把有意义的符号刻画出，比如在洞壁上记录下月相或画上动物。
